CACO615_CLNTNO in CACO615_CLNTNO = 0 to get the admininstration default)

of PO.TRANSFERCOSTS at the end of GB415 if = 0

= 0 (if ADMN_COUNTRYCODE = CLNT114_COUNTRY and ...)

update PO.TRANSFERCOMMISSION = 0
04.01.2005 SH SCR9993 Added new fields v.INGBANK and CACO615_INGBANK
20.12.2005 SH SCR9532 Changed init of V.DOMESTICRECIPIENT and fixed bug
with init if CLNA_BANK_LEDG_NO = 0
